original_title: China and Kenya mark 80th anniversary of victory over Japanese aggression, fascism
article_summary: China and Kenya commemorated the 80th anniversary of China's victory over Japanese aggression, emphasizing the importance of peace, unity, and global cooperation. The event highlighted China's significant role in the World Anti-Fascist War and warned against distortions of history that minimize China's contribution or recast Japan as a victim. The special photo exhibition also aimed to honor sacrifices made during the war and promote peace and cooperation.</s>
